subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Soccer
Disasters and Emergencies
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: Liverpool F.C. is in position to win England’s top league for the first time since 1990, but memories of the stadium disaster that killed 96 soccer fans in 1989 still haunt the city.
snippet: Liverpool F.C. is in position to win England’s top league for the first time since 1990, but memories of the stadium disaster that killed 96 soccer fans in 1989 still haunt the city.
